entries.name: omit_headings_below
entries.desc: Omits headings with a level less than the given level.

entries.name: accept_document(document)
entries.desc: Adds document to the output, using its heading cutoff if present

entries.name: accept_heading(heading)
entries.desc: Adds heading to the table of contents

entries.name: start_accepting()
entries.desc: Prepares the visitor for text generation

entries.name: suppressed?(heading)
entries.desc: Returns true if heading is below the display threshold
